00032         void AsioSession::sendEventId(event::eventid_t& eventid)
00033         {
00034             event::eventid_t::header_network_type header = eventid.serializeHeader();
00035             boost::asio::write(*_sock,
00036                                boost::asio::buffer(&header,
00037                                                    event::eventid_t::headerSerializedSize()),
00038                                boost::asio::transfer_all());
00039             if(event::eventid_t::hasBody())
00040             {
00041                 event::EventIdBodySerialized bodySerialized = eventid.serializeBody();
00042                 boost::asio::write(*_sock,
00043                                    boost::asio::buffer(bodySerialized.data,
00044                                                        bodySerialized.size),
00045                                    boost::asio::transfer_all());
00046             }
00047         }
00048 
00049         event::eventid_t_ptr AsioSession::receiveEventId()
00050         {
00051             event::eventid_t::header_type header = event::eventid_t::deserializeHeader(_headerBuf[0]);
00052 
00053             if(event::eventid_t::hasBody())
00054             {
00055                 uint8_t bodySerializedSize = event::eventid_t::bodySerializedSize(header);
00056                 boost::shared_array<char> body = boost::shared_array<char>(new char[bodySerializedSize]); // Using shared array to avoid memory leaks on transfer exceptions
00057                 int bytes_read = boost::asio::read(*_sock,
00058                                                    boost::asio::buffer(body.get(),
00059                                                                        bodySerializedSize),
00060                                                    boost::asio::transfer_all());
00061                 return event::eventid_t::makeFromNetwork(header, body.get());
00062             }
00063             else
00064             {
00065                 return event::eventid_t::makeFromNetwork(header, NULL);
00066             }
00067         }

00069         void AsioSession::sendNumElements(uint32_t numElements)
00070         {
00071             uint32_t numElementsNetworkOrder = htonl(numElements);
00072             boost::asio::write(*_sock,
00073                                boost::asio::buffer(&numElementsNetworkOrder,
00074                                                   sizeof(uint32_t)),
00075                                boost::asio::transfer_all());
00076         }
00077 
00078         uint32_t AsioSession::receiveNumElements()
00079         {
00080             boost::array<uint32_t, 1> buf;
00081             int bytes_read = boost::asio::read(*_sock,
00082                                                boost::asio::buffer(buf),
00083                                                boost::asio::transfer_all());
00084             return ntohl(buf[0]);
00085         }
00086 
00087         void AsioSession::sendData(serialize::BaseResult_ptr data)
00088         {
00089             uint32_t sizeNetworkOrder = htonl(data->size());
00090             boost::asio::write(*_sock,
00091                                boost::asio::buffer(&sizeNetworkOrder,
00092                                                    sizeof(uint32_t)),
00093                                boost::asio::transfer_all());
00094             boost::asio::write(*_sock,
00095                                boost::asio::buffer(data->data(), data->size()),
00096                                boost::asio::transfer_all());
00097         }
00098 
00099         void AsioSession::sendEvent(event::Event_ptr event)
00100         {
00101             boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> lock(_sendLock);
00102             sendEventId(event->eventid_object());
00103             sendNumElements(event->size());
00104             for(int i = 0; i < event->size(); i++)
00105             {
00106                 sendData(event->serialize_at(i));
00107             }
00108         }
00109 
00110         void AsioSession::receiveEvents()
00111         {
00112             boost::asio::async_read(*_sock,
00113                                     boost::asio::buffer(_headerBuf),
00114                                     boost::asio::transfer_all(),
00115                                     boost::bind(&AsioSession::onHeaderReceived,
00116                                                 this, _1, _2));
00117         }
00118 
00119         void AsioSession::onHeaderReceived(const boost::system::error_code& error,
00120                                            std::size_t bytesTransferred)
00121         {
00122             if(!handleOnHeaderReceivedErrors(error, bytesTransferred))
00123             {
00124                 return;
00125             }
00126             //std::cerr << "onHeaderReceived()" << std::endl;
00127             //std::cerr << "onHeaderReceived() no errors" << std::endl;
00128 
00129             //uint32_t eventid = ntohl(_headerBuf[0]);
00130             //uint32_t numElements = ntohl(_headerBuf[1]);
00131             //std::cerr << "onHeaderReceived() eventid:" << eventid
00132                 //<< ", numElements:" << numElements << std::endl;
00133 
00134             event::eventid_t_ptr eventid;
00135             datastruct::MutableCharArrayVector_ptr dataBufs;
00136             {
00137                 boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> lock(_receiveLock);
00138                 eventid = receiveEventId();
00139                 uint32_t numElements = receiveNumElements();
00140 
00141                 dataBufs = receiveAllDataAndHandleErrors(numElements);
00142             }
00143 
00144             event::Event_ptr event = event::Event::make(eventid->value(), dataBufs);
00145             _allEventsHandler(shared_from_this(), event);
00146             //std::cerr << "onHeaderReceived() finished!" << std::endl;
00147             receiveEvents();
00148         }
00149 
00150         bool AsioSession::handleOnHeaderReceivedErrors(const boost::system::error_code& error,
00151                                                        std::size_t bytesTransferred)
00152         {
00153             if (error == boost::asio::error::eof)
00154             {
00155                 _disconnectHandler(shared_from_this());
00156                 return false;
00157             }
00158             else if (error)
00159             {
00160                 if(!_sock->is_open())
00161                 {
00162                     // This will happen if we close() the session, because
00163                     // the async_read operation will get a "Operation canceled"
00164                     // exception.
00165                     return false;
00166                 } else
00167                 {
00168                     BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(ReceiveHeaderError()
00169                                           << BoostSystemCondition(error.default_error_condition().message())
00170                                           << BoostSystemMsg(error.message()));
00171                 }
00172             }
00173             else if(bytesTransferred != event::eventid_t::headerSerializedSize())
00174             {
00175                 throw std::runtime_error("bytesTransferred is incorrect"); // This is a bug, because transfer_all() should make this impossible.
00176             }
00177             return true;
00178         }
00179 
00180         datastruct::MutableCharArray_ptr AsioSession::receiveData()
00181         {
00182             boost::array<uint32_t, 1> dataSizeBuf;
00183             int bytes_read = boost::asio::read(*_sock,
00184                                                boost::asio::buffer(dataSizeBuf),
00185                                                boost::asio::transfer_all());
00186             assert(bytes_read == sizeof(uint32_t));
00187             uint32_t dataSize = ntohl(dataSizeBuf[0]);
00188 
00189             char *data = new char[dataSize];
00190             boost::asio::read(*_sock,
00191                               boost::asio::buffer(data, dataSize),
00192                               boost::asio::transfer_all());
00193             return boost::make_shared<datastruct::MutableCharArray>(data, dataSize);
00194         }
00195 
00196         datastruct::MutableCharArrayVector_ptr AsioSession::receiveAllData(unsigned numElements)
00197         {
00198             datastruct::MutableCharArrayVector_ptr dataBufs = boost::make_shared<datastruct::MutableCharArrayVector>();
00199             for(int i = 0; i < numElements; i++)
00200             {
00201                 datastruct::MutableCharArray_ptr buffer = receiveData();
00202                 dataBufs->push_back(buffer);
00203             }
00204             return dataBufs;
00205         }
00206 
00207         datastruct::MutableCharArrayVector_ptr AsioSession::receiveAllDataAndHandleErrors(unsigned numElements)
00208         {
00209             try
00210             {
00211                 return receiveAllData(numElements);
00212             }
00213             catch(boost::system::system_error& error)
00214             {
00215                 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(ReceiveDataBoostSystemError()
00216                                       << BoostSystemCondition(error.code().default_error_condition().message())
00217                                       << BoostSystemMsg(error.code().message()));
00218             } catch(std::exception& e) {
00219                 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(ReceiveDataStdError()
00220                                       << StdErrorMsg(e.what()));
00221             } catch(...) {
00222                 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(ReceiveDataUnknownError());
00223             }
00224         }
00225 
00226         void AsioSession::close()
00227         {
00228             boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> lock(_closeMutex);
00229             static int c = 0;
00230             if(_sock->is_open())
00231             {
00232                 boost::system::error_code ignored_error;
00233                 _sock->shutdown(boost::asio::ip::tcp::socket::shutdown_send, ignored_error);
00234                 _sock->shutdown(boost::asio::ip::tcp::socket::shutdown_receive, ignored_error);
00235                 _sock->close(ignored_error);
00236             }
00237         }

00239         socket::Address_ptr AsioSession::getRemoteEndpointAddress()
00240         {
00241             std::string host = _sock->remote_endpoint().address().to_string();
00242             unsigned short port = _sock->remote_endpoint().port();
00243             return socket::Address::make(host, port);
00244         }
00245 
00246         socket::Address_ptr AsioSession::getLocalEndpointAddress()
00247         {
00248             std::string host = _sock->local_endpoint().address().to_string();
00249             unsigned short port = _sock->local_endpoint().port();
00250             return socket::Address::make(host, port);
00251         }
